meanings.sent1: The shape was trigonous with its three equal sides.
meanings.sent2: The trigonous figure was easy to identify in the geometry lesson.
meanings.sent3: The trigonous cookie was a hit at the party, everyone loved its unique shape.
meanings.sent4: Her trigonous thinking always led her to consider all angles of a situation.
meanings.sent5: The trigonous mountain peak stood out against the clear blue sky.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to a triangle.
meanings.sent1: The trigonous pattern on the fabric resembled tiny triangles.
meanings.sent2: The trigonous design of the building's roof added an interesting touch.
meanings.sent3: She found a trigonous rock that looked like a perfect triangle, nature's art!
meanings.sent4: The trigonous relationship between the three friends was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The trigonous shadow cast by the streetlight created a unique shape on the sidewalk.
